name: GDDL Integration
description: Integration with Geometry Dash Demon Ladder - level tiers, search and more

issues.info: You can submit an <cr>bug report</c>/<cj>feature request</c> directly to the mod's repo here

button-position.name: Button position
button-position.description: Sets the GDDL Button position on the level info page

use-old-tier-label.name: Use old tier label
use-old-tier-label.description: Changes the tier button into a label, allows for shifting it up and down

exclude-range.name: Include/Exclude range
exclude-range.description: The GDDL Button will be hidden/shown on the level pages within the exclusion/inclusion range
